task.name: Atom Expressions
task.intro:
Introduction
This cheat sheet shows how atoms can be selected in Jmol.
task.onCompletion:
Conclusion
Selecting atoms is the start of changing the default visualization.

task.name: Coloring Atoms
task.intro:
Introduction
Using the knowledge from the atom expression cheat sheet, we can use this to change the colors used to depict atoms.
task.onCompletion:
Conclusion
Coloring atoms differently from the default is an excellent way to highlight part of the structure.
